column5: We have 2 private rooms located close to The University of North Texas, Texas Woman's University,  Downtown Denton, restaurants, and numerous family-friendly activities. Our home is great for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, families (with kids), and furry friends (pets). Families can rent a second room for $50 total. This includes 2 single sized bunk beds, great for kids.  Perfect location for those in town for college visits or attending one of Denton's many festivals.
column8: Cozy rooms to rest at between adventures in Denton
